header.header-slogan: We were born to make a difference!
header.header-info: At EMPATADOS Corporation we create educational opportunities with diversity, equity and equality, for the construction of a fair and peaceful country; for children, youth and teachers in Colombia and Latin America.

purpose.purpose-info: At EMPATADOS Corporation we believe that equality and equity of educational opportunities and empathy towards differences are fundamental for the construction of a fair and peaceful country.

mission.mission-info: We promote opportunities for equality, diversity and equity in education; in childhood, youth and teaching.

actions.actions-1: Leadership development in young people through the appropriation of their territory.
actions.actions-2: Strengthen basic and secondary education in high-need areas.
actions.actions-3: Empowerment and collective action of teachers.
actions.actions-4: Social action initiatives for the improvement of basic and secondary education.

projects.projects-1: Experimental training program in the life project for children and youth.
projects.projects-2: This initiative seeks to reach places where access to educational opportunities is limited.
